short.es: Ideas instantáneas, con un solo clic.
short.fr: Des idées instantanées, en un seul clic.
short.it: Intuizioni istantanee, con un solo clic.
short.ja: 瞬時の洞察、ワンクリックで。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Description:
Get webpage summaries and tags in your language! TLDR helps you quickly grasp the main content of any webpage. Save time and decide instantly if the content is worth reading. Currently supported output languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, and Italian.

Pricing:
After the trial, enjoy uninterrupted access through our affordable subscription plans.
